content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Great to hear! Could you please tell me the exact number of the final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 850 euros per month.
name: Evaluator

content:
Excellent! On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator
